[generators]
cmake


[requires]
boost/1.76.0
abseil/20200923.3
magic_enum/0.6.6
ctre/3.3.2
entt/3.6.0
range-v3/0.11.0
glm/0.9.9.8
stb/20200203
ctti/0.0.1@clawmancat/stable
sdl2/2.0.12@clawmancat/stable
spirv-cross/20210115
shaderc/2021.1
vulkan-sdk/1.0.0@clawmancat/stable
glew/2.2.0


[options]
boost:header_only=True
sdl2:iconv=False
glew:shared=True


[imports]
bin, *.dll -> ./bin
lib, *.dll -> ./bin
bin, *.dylib -> ./bin
lib, *.dylib -> ./bin
bin, *.so -> ./bin
lib, *.so -> ./bin
